des:
FOR SALE: 4 bedroom & 2.5 bath home. Exclusively listed by: Cindi Hagley with Signature Real Estate.

This home features a newly remodeled kitchen, an open, expansive design, wrap around porch, in-ground spa, front private patio, rear deck, and fruit trees - all on a premium lot. Premium plantation shutters and Silhouettes throughout, plenty of room for both gathering - and private space. The first floor has formal living room/dining room, family room off kitchen, laundry room, and bath. Second level has two spacious, light filled bedrooms and one bath. Just a few steps up, the additional level houses the large master suite....overlooking the lush backyard, as well as 1 BR that would be perfect as a den, office or nursery. Views of Mt Diablo, Brushy Peak, and the windmills. Walking distance to schools and park. Easy freeway access, and close to shopping, dining, Costco, premium outlet mall, Starbucks - and minutes from both downtown Livermore and downtown Pleasanton.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
